.. _Parameters_Page:

==========
Parameters
==========

.. toctree::
   :hidden:
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   parameters_overview
   parameters_global_setting
   parameters_segmentation
   parameters_track_linking
   parameters_signal_extraction

This section is organized into the following subsections.

*  :ref:`parameters_overview_Page`. Organization of parameters. Importance of parameters.
*  :ref:`parameters_global_setting_Page`. Parameters used by all modules.
*  :ref:`parameters_segmentation_Page`. Parameters for Segmentation.
*  :ref:`parameters_track_linking_Page`. Parameters for Track Linking.
*  :ref:`parameters_signal_extraction_Page`. Parameters for Signal Extraction.
